mapper.select: SELECT a.REQUST_ID , a.OCCRRNC_DE , a.SVC_NM , a.METHOD_NM , a.PROCESS_SE_CODE , c.CODE_NM AS PROCESS_SE_CODE_NM , a.PROCESS_TIME , a.RQESTER_IP , a.RQESTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS RQESTER_NM FROM LETTNSYSLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON TRIM(a.PROCESS_SE_CODE) = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'COM033' AND a.REQUST_ID = #{requstId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTSSYSLOGSUMMARY SELECT TO_CHAR(b.CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') as OCCRRNC_DE , 'Member-login' as SVC_NM , 'actionLogin' as METHOD_NM , SUM(CASE WHEN b.CONECT_MTHD = 'I' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CREAT_CO , SUM(CASE WHEN b.CONECT_MTHD = 'U' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UPDT_CO , SUM(CASE WHEN b.CONECT_MTHD = 'R' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RDCNT , SUM(CASE WHEN b.CONECT_MTHD = 'O' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DELETE_CO , 0 AS OUTPT_CO , 0 AS ERROR_CO FROM LETTNLOGINLOG b WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT c.OCCRRNC_DE FROM LETTSSYSLOGSUMMARY c WHERE TRIM(c.OCCRRNC_DE) = TO_CHAR((SYSDATE -1 ), 'YYYYMMDD') ) AND TO_CHAR(b.CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR((SYSDATE -1 ), 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(b.CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') , b.CONECT_MTHD
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LETTNLOGINLOG WHERE TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') < TO_CHAR((SYSDATE -210 ), 'YYYYMMDD')
